Subject: A new comer
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=169570089
X-Yahoo-Profile: shadowess_azogoth

The small ship went flying through space.  the ship had been flying 
through the black depths for space for a hundred years.  
The bot that piloted the ship was StarFlier.  She sat in the pilot's 
seat and watched out the window for a glimps of a planet.  She had 
flown in search of Cybertron. But as of yet, no success. 
She was beginning to wonder if the rumor that the planet didn't 
servive the war was true. 

Her radar showed a planet off to her right. Her scanners wouldn't 
read what kind of planet it was untill she was only 5 hours out. As 
of now, she was 8 hours out.  

"Well, with luck, I'll land somewhere and find a friend to talk to. 
Oh Pit, at least anything living would be nice."  She turned the ship 
towards the planet and crossed her fingers hoping it was Cybertron. 

She reached for the console where her cup of hot energon was sitting, 
when something hit the side wing and sent the ship into a spin.  With 
some great effort, she finally got the ship to straighten out.

"Whooh, that was close."  She pressed a button to run a diognostic, 
when something hit the ship again. Only this time, it tore off the 
back tailfin and she was left with no engine power. Engine gages 
showed the impulse coils were going to explode.  She pressed the 
buttons on the console, and the whole enginge drive was ejected out 
the back. However, just as it cleared, it exploded. The power from 
the explosion sent her hurtling towards a planet.  She faught 
furiously, but got the emergency power packs working. She'd have 
enough power to maybe get the ship somewhere close. But she was being 
hurtled out of control.  

"DAMN! OK, hang on, try to keep control.  OK, use the guidence jets, 
hold course towards the planet.  OK, if I calculate this right, at 
this rate, I'll be at that planet in only 5 hours.  This isn't going 
to an easy landing when I get into the atmosphere of what ever ball 
that is infront of me."  She was struggling to hold the drive stick 
steady. "OK, what did I get told to do when slag happened? Oh yeah, 
hold the stick stead, keep an eye on the gages, keep both feet on the 
pedals, bend forward, put your head between your legs and kiss your 
aft-thrusters goodbye."  

She watched as the time seemed to pass to quickly to notice. Soon, 
the planet was right in front of her. "Holy Pit!"

She closed her eyes for a second,"Matrix, watch out for me."
Her ship started to enter the atmosphere.
